import sys
from math import ceil
input = sys.stdin.readline
output = sys.stdout.write

def main():
    qmars = int(input().rstrip())
    for i in range(qmars):
        num = int(input().rstrip())
        ans = ceil(num / 2)
        output(str(ans))
        output('\n')
main()
